P

processLIST() - Method in class ftp.FtpRequest
Sends a list of files/directory in the current directory.
processPASV() - Method in class ftp.FtpRequest
(Passive mode) Waits for a connection from the client.
processPORT(String) - Method in class ftp.FtpRequest
(Active mode) Process the information sent by the client to initiate a connection with the client.
processRETR(String) - Method in class ftp.FtpRequest
Send file to client.
processSTOR(String) - Method in class ftp.FtpRequest
Store a file on the serveur.
processUSER(String) - Method in class ftp.FtpRequest
Checks whether a user exists in the allowed user list.
